name: Breach & Clean
description:
ATTENTION:
If you're experiencing problems with downloading the game, try the following:

  1. Dowload the Itch-app
  2. Log in to your itch-account on the app
  3. Browse for "Breach and Clean"
  4. Download the game from the app

Breach & Clean is an Authentic Hotel Maintenance Simulation.

Production & Design:
Rami Ismail

Audio Design & Recording:
Lovisa Bergdahl

Original Soundtrack & Composition:
Pablo Sorribes Bernhard

Art:
Mateusz 'Mate' Głuszek

Programming:
Mateusz 'Wulo' Kietliński
Krzysztof 'Dalton' Pachulski
Dominik 'Vos' Zgutka (also fought ninjas)

Script & Language:
Emilia Pachulska

Voice Actors:
Rami Ismail
Emilia Pachulska
Michał Szewczak
Jakub Skałecki
Dominika Bodzon
Emilia Emi Szymańska
Robin Baumgarten
Maurizio Scuiar

Legal Notice:
Breach & Clean uses sound effects from Boom Library and the Sonniss Sound Effects Library.

Breach & Clean uses FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies.

Breach & Clean uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2016, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved. I hope you're happy, Joe.

Special Thanks To:

James Newnorth, Castle Game Jam & all the volunteers & organizers.

Breach & Clean is infinitely grateful for the friendly support from the Elite Stora Hotel in Örebro.

Breach & Clean would not exist without the stubborn housekeeping of the Hesperia Tower Hotel in Barcelona.

Thanks to our family, friends & partners.

Official Soundtrack (OST):
https://soundcloud.com/pablosorribes
